title: Understanding Trendlines
text: A trendline is a graphical representation of trends in data series, often used to analyze patterns or predict future values.

title: Locating Chart Tools
text: To add a trendline, you need to access the Chart Tools in your spreadsheet or charting software. This is usually found in the toolbar when a chart is selected.

hintAnswer: select the chart, then 'Add Chart Element' (Chart Tools Design|Chart Layouts), and 'Trendline'
title: Step-by-Step Guide
text: First, select the chart you want to add a trendline to. Then, navigate to the 'Add Chart Element' option under Chart Tools Design or Chart Layouts.
choices: select the chart, then 'Add Chart Element' (Chart Tools Design
input average values over time to create a trendline
